meanings.definition: Covered with or full of bumps
meanings.sent1: The bumpy road made the car shake.
meanings.sent2: She held onto the bumpy handle tightly.
meanings.sent3: The bumpy ride on the rollercoaster made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: His bumpy journey through life taught him resilience.
meanings.sent5: The bumpy texture of the fabric felt rough against her skin.

meanings.sent1: The bumpy ground made it hard to walk.
meanings.sent2: The old wooden floor was bumpy underfoot.
meanings.sent3: The bumpy cake looked like a mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her bumpy path to success was filled with obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The bumpy terrain of the hiking trail challenged the hikers.

meanings.definition: Marked by sudden changes or difficulties
meanings.sent1: The bumpy start to the project surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: Their relationship hit a bumpy patch but they worked through it.
meanings.sent3: The bumpy meeting left everyone feeling uneasy.
meanings.sent4: Her bumpy day ended with a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent5: The bumpy journey of the story kept the readers engaged.
